column2:
"I've been hearing people talk about how
impressive your chops are."

"But I like to say the proof of the pudding
is in the eating, if you get my drift."

"So what do you say? Are you up for a time
attack? You know, a race to achieve a
goal faster than others."

"Of course, I expect you to clear my test with a max rating on top of finishing
before you're out of time."

"Set a record, claim your bounty.
What do you got to lose?"
